mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, inviter_id AS inviterId, activity_id AS activityId, rebate_type AS rebateType, rebate_value AS rebateValue, biz_id AS bizId, state, create_time AS createTime FROM rebate_order WHERE biz_id = #{bizId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rebate_order (user_id, inviter_id, activity_id, rebate_type, rebate_value, biz_id, state) VALUES (#{userId}, #{inviterId}, #{activityId}, #{rebateType}, #{rebateValue}, #{bizId}, #{state})
